alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 02 at 9:57AM MDT until October 03 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25, if not lower, in some spots. * WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin, Central Yampa River Basin, Upper Yampa River Basin and Central Colorado River Basin. * WHEN...Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin
